channel.title: CVE Feed for Repox -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Repox -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6718|2024-10-01T14:47:57.187Z -- repox -- repox
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability has been found in Repox, which allows a remote user to send a specially crafted POST request, due to the lack of any authentication method, resulting in the alteration or creation of users.
